components.description: Schwinn N'Litened Gold Label double butted Aluminum with Black Label Carbon seat stay and Bio Tuned Ergonomic geometry
Xero Shawla 280 wheel set with aero double wall rim 28 hole front and 32 hole rear
Resin body road with steel axle and toe clip & straps
Tektro R 538 alloy long reach caliper(F), Tektro R 538 alloy long reach caliper(R)
Tektro R 538 alloy long reach caliper
Road Tuned 1 1/8" threadless A-head for 31.8 bar
Schwinn Bio Tuned with Glob System
Road Tuned Black Label Carbon with forged alloy head
